Verses: 1 appozhudhu Pilaaththu Yesuvaippidiththu Vaarinaal Adippiththaan.
2 porchchevagar Mullugalinaal Oru Mudiyaip Pinni Avar Sirasinmel Vaiththu, Sivappaana Oru Angiyai Avarukku Uduththi:
3 yoodharudaiya Raajaave, Vaazhga Endru Solli, Avaraik Kaiyinaal Adiththaargal.
4 pilaaththu Marupadiyum Veliye Vandhu: Naan Ivanidaththil Oru Kutramum Kaanen Endru Neengal Ariyumpadikku, Idho, Ungalidaththil Ivanai Veliye Konduvarugiren Endraan.
5 yesu, Mulmudiyum Sivappangiyum Thariththavaraai, Veliye Vandhaar. Appozhudhu Pilaaththu Avargalai Nokki: Idho, Indha Manushan Endraan.

6 pradhaana Aasaariyarum Sevagarum Avaraik Kandapodhu: Siluvaiyil Araiyum Siluvaiyil Araiyum Endru Saththamittaargal. Adharkup Pilaaththu: Neengale Ivanaik Kondupoi Siluvaiyil Araiyungal, Naan Ivanidaththil Oru Kutramum Kaanen Endraan.

7 yoodhargal Avanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Engalukku Oru Nyaayappramaanamundu, Ivan Thannai Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranendru Sonnapadiyinaal, Andha Nyaayappramaanaththinpadiye, Ivan Saagavendum Endraargal.
8 pilaaththu Indha Vaarththaiyaik Kettapozhudhu Adhigamaai Bayandhu,
9 marupadiyum Aramanaikkulle Poi, Yesuvai Nokki: Nee Engeyirundhu Vandhavan Endraan. Adharku Yesu Maaruththaram Ondrum Sollavillai.
10 appozhudhu Pilaaththu: Nee Ennode Pesugiradhillaiyaa? Unnai Siluvaiyil Araiya Enakku Adhigaaramundendrum, Unnai Vidudhalaipanna Enakku Adhigaaramundendrum Unakkuth Theriyaadhaa Endraan.

11 yesu Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Paraththilirundhu Umakkuk Kodukkappadaadhirundhaal, Enmel Umakku Oru Adhigaaramumiraadhu; Aanapadiyinaale Ennai Ummidaththil Oppukkoduththavanukku Adhiga Paavamundu Endraar.

12 adhumudhal Pilaaththu Avarai Vidudhalaipanna Vagaithedinaan. Yoodhargal Avanai Nokki: Ivanai Vidudhalaipanninaal Neer Raayanukku Snegidhanalla; Thannai Raajaavengiravanevano Avan Raayanukku Virodhi Endru Saththamittaargal.

13 pilaaththu Indha Vaarththaiyaik Kettapozhudhu, Yesuvai Veliye Azhaiththuvandhu, Thalavarisaippaduththina Medaiyendrum, Ebireyu Baashaiyile Kabaththaa Endrum Sollappatta Idaththile, Nyaayaasanaththinmel Utkaarndhaan.
14 andha Naal Paskaavukku Aayaththanaalum Erakkuraiya Aarumani Neramumaayirundhadhu; Appozhudhu Avan Yoodhargalai Nokki: Idho, Ungal Raajaa Endraan.

15 avargal: Ivanai Agatrum Agatrum, Siluvaiyil Araiyum Endru Saththamittaargal. Adharkup Pilaaththu: Ungal Raajaavai Naan Siluvaiyil Araiyalaamaa Endraan. Pradhaana Aasaariyar Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Raayaneyallaamal Engalukku Vere Raajaa Illai Endraargal.
16 appozhudhu Avarai Siluvaiyil Araiyumpadikku Avargalidaththil Oppukkoduththaan. Avargal Yesuvaip Pidiththukkonduponaargal.
17 avar Thammudaiya Siluvaiyai Sumandhukondu, Ebireyu Baashaiyile Kolkodhaa Endru Sollappadum Kabaalasthalam Engira Idaththirkup Purappattupponaar.
18 ange Avarai Siluvaiyil Araindhaargal; Avarodekooda Veriranduperai Irandu Pakkangalilum Yesuvai Naduvilumaaga Siluvaigalil Araindhaargal.
19 pilaaththu Oru Melvilaasaththai Ezhudhi, Siluvaiyinmel Poduviththaan. Adhil Nasareyanaagiya Yesu Yoodharudaiya Raajaa Endru Ezhudhiyirundhadhu.

20 yesu Siluvaiyil Araiyappatta Idam Nagaraththirku Sameebamaayirundhapadiyinaal, Yoodharil Anegar Andha Melvilaasaththai Vaasiththaargal; Adhu Ebireyu Grekku Laththeen Baashaigalil Ezhudhiyirundhadhu.
21 appozhudhu Yoodharudaiya Pradhaana Aasaariyar Pilaaththuvai Nokki: Yoodharudaiya Raajaa Endru Neer Ezhudhaamal, Thaan Yoodharudaiya Raajaa Endru Avan Sonnadhaaga Ezhudhum Endraargal.
22 pilaaththu Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Naanezhudhinadhu Ezhudhinadhe Endraan.

23 por Sevagar Yesuvai Siluvaiyil Araindhapinbu, Avarudaiya Vasthirangalai Eduththu, Ovvoru Sevaganukku Ovvoru Pangaaga Naalu Pangaakkinaargal; Angiyaiyum Eduththaargal, Andha Angi, Thaiyalillaamal Mele Thodangi Muzhudhum Neyyappattadhaayirundhadhu.

24 avargal: Idhai Naam Kizhiyaamal, Yaarukku Varumo Endru Idhaikkuriththu Seettuppoduvom Endru Oruvarodoruvar Pesikkondaargal. En Vasthirangalaith Thangalukkulle Pangittu, En Udaiyinmel Seettuppottaargal Engira Vedhavaakkiyam Niraiveraththakkadhaagap Porchchevagar Ippadi Seydhaargal.
25 yesuvin Siluvaiyinaruge Avarudaiya Thaayum, Avarudaiya Thaayin Sagodhari Kileyoppaa Mariyaalum, Magadhalenaa Mariyaalum Nindrukondirundhaargal.
26 appozhudhu Yesu Thammudaiya Thaayaiyum Aruge Nindra Thamakku Anbaayirundha Seeshanaiyum Kandu, Thammudaiya Thaayai Nokki: Sthreeye, Adho, Un Magan Endraar.
27 pinbu Andha Seeshanai Nokki: Adho, Un Thaai Endraar. Anneramudhal Andha Seeshan Avalaith Thannidamaai Etrukkondaan.
28 adhanpinbu, Ellaam Mudindhadhu Endru Yesu Arindhu, Vedhavaakkiyam Niraiveraththakkadhaaga: Thaagamaayirukkiren Endraar.
29 kaati Niraindha Paaththiram Ange Vaikkappattirundhadhu; Avargal Kadarkaalaanaik Kaatiyile Thoiththu, Eesoppuththandil Maatti, Avar Vaayinidaththil Neettikkoduththaargal.
30 yesu Kaatiyai Vaanginapinbu, Mudindhadhu Endru Solli, Thalaiyaichchaaiththu, Aaviyai Oppukkoduththaar.

31 andha Naal Periya Oivunaalukku Aayaththanaalaayirundhapadiyinaal, Udalgal Andha Oivunaalile Siluvaigalil Iraadhapadikku, Yoodhargal Pilaaththuvinidaththil Poi, Avargaludaiya Kaalelumbugalai Murikkumpadikkum, Udalgalai Eduththuppodumpadikkum Uththaravu Kettukkondaargal.
32 andhappadi Porchchevagar Vandhu, Avarudanekooda Siluvaiyil Araiyappatta Mundhinavanudaiya Kaalelumbugalaiyum Matravanudaiya Kaalelumbugalaiyum Muriththaargal.
33 avargal Yesuvinidaththil Vandhu, Avar Mariththirukkiradhaik Kandu, Avarudaiya Kaalelumbugalai Murikkavillai.
34 aagilum Porchchevagaril Oruvan Eettiyinaale Avarudaiya Vilaavil Kuththinaan; Udane Raththamum Thanneerum Purappattadhu.
35 adhaik Kandavan Saatchi Kodukkiraan, Avanudaiya Saatchi Meyyaayirukkiradhu; Neengal Visuvaasikkumpadi, Thaan Sollugiradhu Meyyendru Avan Arindhirukkiraan.
36 avarudaiya Elumbugalil Ondrum Murikkappaduvadhillai Engira Vedhavaakkiyam Niraiverumpadi Ivaigal Nadandhadhu.
37 allaamalum Thaangal Kuththinavarai Nokkippaarppaargal Endru Veroru Vedhavaakkiyam Sollugiradhu.

38 ivaigalukkuppinbu Arimaththiyaa Ooraanum, Yoodharukkup Bayandhadhinaal Yesuvukku Andharanga Seeshanumaagiya Yoseppu Yesuvin Sareeraththai Eduththukkondupogumpadi Pilaaththuvinidaththil Uththaravu Kettaan; Pilaaththu Uththaravu Koduththaan. Aagaiyaal Avan Vandhu, Yesuvin Sareeraththai Eduththukkonduponaan.
39 aarambaththile Oru Raaththiriyil Yesuvinidaththil Vandhirundha Nikkodhemu Enbavan Vellaippolamum Kariyapolamum Kalandhu Erakkuraiya Nooru Raaththal Konduvandhaan.
40 avargal Yesuvin Sareeraththai Eduththu, Yoodhargal Adakkampannum Muraimaiyinpadiye Adhai Sugandhavarkkangaludane Seelaigalil Sutrik Kattinaargal.
41 avar Siluvaiyil Araiyappatta Idaththil Oru Thottamum, Andhath Thottaththil Orukkaalum Oruvanum Vaikkappattiraadha Oru Pudhiya Kallaraiyum Irundhadhu.
42 yoodharudaiya Aayaththanaalaanapadiyinaalum, Andhak Kallarai Sameebamaayirundhapadiyinaalum, Avvidaththile Yesuvai Vaiththaargal.
